label: Orthopedic Supports
description: Products designed to support and protect various parts of the body, including ankles, knees, wrists, elbows, shoulders, and back.
intents: Aid in recovery from injury or surgery

subcategories.label: Knee Supports
subcategories.description: Products designed to support and protect the knee joint.

subcategories.label: Ankle Supports
subcategories.description: Products designed to support and protect the ankle joint.

subcategories.label: Wrist Supports
subcategories.description: Products designed to support and protect the wrist joint.

subcategories.label: Elbow Supports
subcategories.description: Products designed to support and protect the elbow joint.

subcategories.label: Shoulder Supports
subcategories.description: Products designed to support and protect the shoulder joint.

subcategories.label: Back Supports
subcategories.description: Products designed to support and protect the back.

subcategories.label: Posture Correctors
subcategories.description: Products designed to improve posture and alleviate back pain.

subcategories.label: Hernia Supports
subcategories.description: Products designed to support and protect hernias.
